Articles.Content:
I decided to revamp my old AH-1Z replica, this one has a new layer of paint, a more realistic, smoother framework, and less parts, sadly for Functionality over Form I have to go for the large 3 bladed rotors, as the 4 bladed ones aren't powerful enough. This helicopter is very nice for flying around in, and is really stable, she can hold quite a lot of weaponry and because of it's body, it can be painted into different colours.

 

KerbalX: https://kerbalx.com/Sebastiaz/Bell-AH-1Z-Viper-V2

Album: https://imgur.com/a/6cZm9Gu
